claims.claim: Landlords can play a role in providing housing to formerly incarcerated individuals.
claims.quote: there are programs like in Genesee County centered around housing where they are specifically working with landlords.

claims.claim: Sheriff Chris Swanson is involved in aiding formerly incarcerated individuals in securing housing.
claims.quote: Sheriff Chris, Chris Swanson who I know has been integral into helping people who are formerly incarcerated find safe, stable, and secure housing.
